document_data.title: Beyond the Dragon of Icespire Peak
document_data.author: [[Shawn Merwin]], [[Will Doyle]], [[James Introcaso]]
document_data.citetitle: Dungeons & Dragons Essentials Kit/Beyond the Dragon of Icespire Peak
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Beyond the Dragon of Icespire Peak''''' is the collective name for a series of three online-only adventures released as sequels to ''[[Dragon of Icespire Peak]]'', the adventure included in the ''[[Dungeons & Dragons Essentials Kit]]'' for [[5th edition]]. The adventures were originally made available exclusively through [[D&D Beyond]], and were subsequently released for various virtual tabletop platforms.

The adventures are:
* ''[[Storm Lord's Wrath]]''
* ''[[Sleeping Dragon's Wake]]''
* ''[[Divine Contention]]''


[[Category:Published in 2019]] 
[[Category:5th edition adventures]] 
[[Category:Adventures]]
